title: FS: Lot of Low Grade T205 SP's  **NEW ADDITIONS**

posts.post_title: FS: Lot of Low Grade T205 SP's  **NEW ADDITIONS**
posts.post_content:
Hello. I have the following lot of T205 cards for sale or trade. These are mostly lower grade cards as the scans will show. 

Please add $2 shipping for 1-2 cards. For 3 or more, I will cover shipping. Payment via any method you prefer.  Please send me a PM or e-mail to [url]marcdelpercio2000@yahoo.com[/url] to purchase any cards or with any questions. Thanks for looking!

CARDS PICTURED (removing **SOLD** cards for easier viewing): 

Crandall ("t" crossed) - $12
J. Collins (card on right) - $45
Ford (white cap) - $22
Mattern (GAI 4 VG-EX) - $40
Bump for a price drop on all remaining cards.  Thanks for looking!
Bump for new additions and price drops!
